full_text: Knitted turtleneck pullover for with bubble decorations. This jumper is knitted in DROPS Merino Extra Fine. The jumper is knitted top-down with raglan sleeves, which makes the work grow naturally over shoulders and chest, and requires minimal assembly. WORK OVERVIEW: • The jumper starts with the neckline and yoke, which are knitted in the round on a circular needle. • You start at the center back and work top-down. • When the yoke is finished, the work is divided into front, back, and sleeves. • The front and back, as well as the sleeves are knitted further in the round on circular needles. SIZES AVAILABLE: XS-XXXL (XS-S-M-L-XL-XXL-XXXL) NEEDLES: Circular needles size 3: Length 40 cm (neckline/sleeve) Circular needles size 4: Length 40 cm / 80 cm (body/sleeve) YARN: GARNSTUDIO DROPS Merino Extra Fine - 04 Grey (600-650-700-750-800-850-900g) The bubbles can be knitted in any yarn/colour you like! :)
